name: ROCK PAPER SCISSORS OF DEATH
description:
Game made in a day for the GamesPlusJam 2022. Its basically rock paper scissors except like there is a random amount of rounds based sorta on Russian Roulette. 

In regards to the assets used I mostly used the UE4 perm free marketplace and free sound. All other assets / sources are listed in the main menu in game.

Github: https://github.com/Sinpkr/GamesPlusJam_2022
